bugreport.title: Home Page - Navigation Bar - "Sign in" button isn't responding
bugreport.description: When the user tried to sigh in from the home page by clicking on the "Sign in" button nothing is happened

stepsToReproduce.Step2: Click the drop-down menu in the navigation bar

bugreport.expectedResult: When the user click on the "Sign in" button, profile page is opened
bugreport.actualResult: When the user click on the "Sign in" button, nothing is happened
